summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Interior Design Project Management Tool focusing on FFE tracking and Checklist scraping functionality. Backend APIs mostly functional (76.5% success rate), Frontend UI working well with luxury aesthetic. FFE tracking fully implemented and functional, but Checklist scraping functionality not accessible in current UI state.

critical_bugs.issue: Playwright browser not installed - returns 400 error with message about missing Chrome executable

format_issues.issue: Returns dict instead of expected list format
format_issues.impact: Category dropdown population may be affected

ui_bugs.issue: No SCRAPE buttons visible in Checklist tab - found 0 tables, 0 rows, 0 SCRAPE buttons
No ADD ITEM buttons found to create items for testing SCRAPE functionality
ui_bugs.affected_functionality: Cannot add items to test scraping

integration_issues.issue: SCRAPE functionality not accessible - no UI elements found for product URL input or scraping
integration_issues.backend_dependency: Requires /api/scrape-product endpoint to be fixed first

working_features.details: 73 TRACK buttons, 73 tracking inputs, 224 carrier dropdowns, status breakdown visible
All tabs (Questionnaire, Walkthrough, Checklist, FF&E) accessible and functional
Can view projects, navigate to project details, luxury aesthetic maintained

passed_tests: Room and category creation with enhanced structure
FFE tracking functionality (TRACK buttons, carrier dropdowns)
action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Install Playwright browsers on server (run 'playwright install') to fix /api/scrape-product endpoint. MEDIUM: Investigate why Checklist spreadsheet shows no items/SCRAPE buttons - may need to populate test data or fix UI rendering. LOW: Fix missing /api/item-statuses endpoint and project UPDATE method.

detailed_findings.ffe_tracking_status: FULLY FUNCTIONAL - 73 items with tracking inputs, carrier dropdowns, and TRACK buttons that open carrier websites
detailed_findings.checklist_scraping_status: NOT ACCESSIBLE - No SCRAPE buttons or URL inputs found in current UI state
detailed_findings.overall_app_stability: GOOD - Core project management and FFE functionality working well
detailed_findings.ui_aesthetic: EXCELLENT - Luxury black/gold/cream design maintained throughout
